abstract: Steel Partners, the hedge fund run by Warren Lichtenstein, on Tuesday lost its final court appeal against a “poison pill” defense by Bull-Dog Sauce, the Japanese condiments maker it has been trying to take over since May.
lead_paragraph: Steel Partners, the hedge fund run by Warren Lichtenstein, on Tuesday lost its final court appeal against a “poison pill” defense by Bull-Dog Sauce, the Japanese condiments maker it has been trying to take over since May.

headline.main: Lichtenstein’s Steel Partners Loses Battle for Bull-Dog
